[1H].description: One-handed Weapons used with a Concentrate action always require two hands instead of just one. Two-handed weapons used with two hands are disallowed to use Overreach. An item may be used with one less hand but this causes a penalty of -1 Base die for the very next Test performed when interrupted by a React. An item may be used with one less hand but this causes a penalty of -1 Base die for the very next Test performed when interrupted by a React.

[2H].description: One-handed Weapons used with a Concentrate action always require two hands instead of just one. Two-handed weapons used with two hands are disallowed to use Overreach. An item may be used with one less hand but this causes a penalty of -1 Base die for the very next Test performed when interrupted by a React. An item may be used with one less hand but this causes a penalty of -1 Base die for the very next Test performed when interrupted by a React.

[Addicted X > Type].description: Psychology. Specify Type as Drunkard, Euphorics, Socialite, or Stimulants. Allow up to 2 Types for any character. At start of Mission check -X Modifier dice Unopposed POW Test. Upon fail identify with Addicted status. Effects are by Type as follows; Drunkard: Penalize -1 Combat Hit and Initiative Tests. Euphorics: Penalize -1 Combat Tests and Initiative Tests. Hallucinogenics: Penalize -1 Combat Tests but award +1 Base die for Morale Tests. Socialite: Penalize -1 Morale Tests and Detect Tests. Stimulants: Penalize -1 Combat Hit and Morale Tests.

[Arc X].description: Attack Effect. Intrinsic. See [Scatter]. May not use Indirect Range Attack against targets closer than X × 8 MU. Subject to the rules for Indirect Attacks. Direct Attacks are penalized -X Wild dice Range Hit Test, and if it misses, the attack must be resolved as an Indirect Attack. If so, use [Scatter] from a location behind target along LOF at a distance equal to Cohesion.

[Automaton!].description: Intrinsic. Unchanging. See Toggle. May never benefit from Initiative Points, perform Initiative Tests, use Reacts, receive Bonus Actions or Passive Player Options. It may never use Pushing nor Concentrate.

[Awkward].description: Attack Effect. Costs an extra AP to perform Attacks while in base-contact with any Opposing model. When an Opposing model, if no smaller than SIZ minus 3, receives the Charge bonus against this model, this model acquires a Delay token before resolving the attack.

[Backblast X].description: Attack Effect. Models within 1 MU of the LOF drawn from target through Attacker up to 2 × X MU behind the Attacker each receive a Burned token, and another if within X MU.

[Beast!].description: Genetic. Unchanging. Disallowed to use Overreach. Rally penalized -1 Wild die. Fiddle actions cost an extra AP. May not perform Initiative Tests for any Side unless only Friendly Beasts remain, but only use IP for same species. Has just zero Hands. May have 1 Hand if sculpted with tentacles or prehensile tail, or some sort of manipulator. May never acquire Idea OMs. May receive +1 Hand for acquiring OMs by negating one Natural weapon trait; Bite, Claws, Lash, Spit, Tentacles. Allow Tiny OMs if SIZ 1+, Small OMs if SIZ 3+, Large OMs if SIZ 5+, Bulky if SIZ 7+. Fiddle actions are always Tested using DR 1, and climbing up or down degrades Terrain. May never acquire Idea or Physical OMs. May not use Advanced Agility nor use Weapons and Equipment.

[Beast].description: Genetic. Unchanging. Disallowed to use Overreach. Rally penalized -1 Wild die. Fiddle actions cost an extra AP. May not perform Initiative Tests for any Side unless only Friendly Beasts remain, but only use IP for same species. Has just zero Hands. May have 1 Hand if sculpted with tentacles or prehensile tail, or some sort of manipulator. May never acquire Idea OMs. May receive +1 Hand for acquiring OMs by negating one Natural weapon trait; Bite, Claws, Lash, Spit, Tentacles. Allow Tiny OMs if SIZ 1+, Small OMs if SIZ 3+, Large OMs if SIZ 5+, Bulky if SIZ 7+. May not use Advanced Agility nor use Weapons and Equipment.

[Beast+].description: Genetic. Unchanging. Disallowed to use Overreach. Rally penalized -1 Wild die. Fiddle actions cost an extra AP. May not perform Initiative Tests for any Side unless only Friendly Beasts remain, but only use IP for same species. Has just zero Hands. May have 1 Hand if sculpted with tentacles or prehensile tail, or some sort of manipulator. May never acquire Idea OMs. May receive +1 Hand for acquiring OMs by negating one Natural weapon trait; Bite, Claws, Lash, Spit, Tentacles. Allow Tiny OMs if SIZ 1+, Small OMs if SIZ 3+, Large OMs if SIZ 5+, Bulky if SIZ 7+.

[Believer > Type].description: Psychology. Character is an overt Believer of belief Belief. Belief must be limited to one of; Revealed, Enlightened, Mysteries, Materialist, Cosmic, Nature A character may only receive Rally Test bonuses from Friendly characters in base-contact unless they have the same Belief or have the Leadership trait.

[Belligerent].description: Psychology. Psychology. If Free and within LOS and movement distance of closest Opposing model at start of Activation either move at least MOV × 1 MU toward it and then attack if possible. Or perform a Morale Test and acquire a Delay token and move towards anyway if fail. Disregard if within Cohesion of a Friendly Ordered unit with the Leadership trait, or itself has the Leadership trait.

[Berserker].description: Psychology. May voluntarily acquire a Fear token once per Turn as a 1 AP Fiddle action. Becomes a |Berserker| with these revised Compulsory Actions rules. Ignores standard Compulsory Actions for when Disordered, Panicked, and never Eliminated as a result. If Disordered or Eliminated by Fear tokens acquired, will attack the closest Opposing model within base-contact, Cohesion, then Visibility; starting with Opposing characters. If Panicked or Eliminated, must attack Friendly characters if no Opposing models within range.

[Blinders].description: Intrinsic. Penalized ˗1 Modifier die in a Scrum. May not perform Bonus Actions unless Attentive. Ranged Attacks with Bow weapons are disallowed, and Thrown weapons are penalized -1 Modifier die.

[Blood-thirsty].description: See Resist > Blinding. If Free and within LOS and Movement distance of easiest to defeat Opposing model at start of Activation must perform Unopposed POW Test or move to Engage it in Close Combat. Must perform Range Combat against target if possible.

[Bond > Target].description: Whenever this character is not within Cohesion of target Character it is penalized -1 Wild dice for Attacker Combat Hit Tests and Morale Tests.

[Braggart].description: May never use the Hide action, nor become Hidden. Any Friendly model within Cohesion suffers -1 Wild die when targeted for Detect Tests.

[Carriage X].description: Intrinsic. Asset. This Item is affixed atop a Carriage of SIZ X. The Carriage can be moved using the Dislodging rules, or it can be carried as though it were [Laden X + 3]. If a Group Action to move or Dislodge the Carriage is performed, use the highest Physicality of all the Members in the Group, and increase it by 1 for each Member with Physicality within 1 of that. All Members will move, reposition, or rotate with the Carriage. In the Group, count every 2 Members if they are within 2 Physicality, and every 4 Members if they are within 3 Physicality.

[Cautious].description: May not perform Attacker Combat until attacked or within LOS of target when it is Distracted or Disordered, unless; within Cohesion of a Friendly Ordered character, part of a Group. Until then must move out of LOS or become Hidden.

[Clumsy!].description: Attack Effect. Costs 2 AP to use if start the Initiative Distracted, or when using after performing Movement, using Agility, or becoming repositioned. If [Clumsy!] then it requires 3 AP to use.

[Clumsy].description: Attack Effect. Costs 2 AP to use if start the Initiative Distracted, or when using after performing Movement, using Agility, or becoming repositioned. If [Clumsy!] then it requires 3 AP to use.

[Comrade].description: Psychology. If Free Attentive Ordered, when a Friendly model becomes KO’d within Visibility, must either attempt Revive action upon it, remove Wait status, or acquire a Delay token.

[Configure X].description: Intrinsic. Must perform X additional Fiddle actions before using for the first time and before any [Emplace].

[Coward].description: Psychology. May never cross into Visibility and LOS of an Attentive Opposing model that could attack using Range Combat unless participating in a Group Move or when activated with an Initiative Point. If Engaged or within a Scrum, must attempt to Disengage by the end of its Initiative by either using any Bonus Action awarded, or by Rushing or spending its last AP. Never allowed to perform the Suppression Test to bypass Suppression effects.

[Crewed X].description: Requires X Attentive Friendly models in base-contact to use this Item in order to perform Actions involving it, also requiring atleast a Hand [1H] for each model. Each model less than required causes +1 AP required to perform an Action.

[Delusional].description: Psychology. All actions cost an additional AP unless Attentive or Engaged.

[Diminutive].description: STR -1, SIZ -1, but +1 Modifier die Defender Detect Test.

[Discard! > Type].description: Asset. See [Discard]. When this Item is intentionally discarded by placing it in base-contact, or by throwing it to some distance to a target location, then it acquires the Asset or Attack Effect traits within list List at that location where it becomes placed. If [Discard! > List] then allow this just once.

[Discard!].description: Asset. Limited used. If [Discard!] do not use again. If [Discard+] then roll a die after each time it is used. If fail, then the next time is the last time it may be used. May not use more than three times in total. Else, after the first time using this, roll a die. If fail, it may not be used again. Otherwise, it may be used just once more.

[Discard > Type].description: Asset. See [Discard]. When this Item is intentionally discarded by placing it in base-contact, or by throwing it to some distance to a target location, then it acquires the Asset or Attack Effect traits within list List at that location where it becomes placed. If [Discard! > List] then allow this just once.

[Discard].description: Asset. Limited uses. If [Discard!] do not use again. If [Discard+] then roll a die after each time it is used. If fail, then the next time is the last time it may be used. May not use more than three times in total. Else, after the first time using this, roll a die. If fail, it may not be used again. Otherwise, it may be used just once more.

[Discard+ > Type].description: Asset. See [Discard+]. When this Item is discarded, the traits in list List are temporarily assigned to the Active character until the start of its next Initiative.

[Discard+].description: Asset. Limited used. If [Discard!] do not use again. If [Discard+] then roll a die after each time it is used. If fail, then the next time is the last time it may be used. May not use more than three times in total. Else, after the first time using this, roll a die. If fail, it may not be used again. Otherwise, it may be used just once more.

[Discord X].description: Asset. Magic. The Item causes other Items also with the Discord keyword to possibly lose their magical abilities. A character is safely allowed total Discord X equal to the total of 1 plus the higher of their INT + POW. It may not acquire any more Items with the [Discord] trait until it discards what it already has.

[Disfigured X].description: May not be assigned to characters with the Presence trait. If becomes disfigured during the course of a campaign, reduce any Presence trait by X.

[Drone X > Actions].description: Intrinsic. Unchanging. Paired with a Controller which spends AP during their Initiative. Unless specified otherwise, begins any game session as Enabled; identify with a Disabled! token as necessary. If Free, may become Enabled by a Free Attentive Ordered character in base-contact using a Fiddle action for 1 AP, or Disabled! for 2 AP. When Enabled, it may perform any actions in list Actions using AP spent by the Controller. If Actions includes a trait, then it requires 1 AP Fiddle action to use that trait, but it becomes optionally available for the entire Initiative. Receive X additional AP specifically for this list if the Controller is Attentive.

[Emplace X > List].description: Asset. Must be Emplaced before it can be used. Requires X AP to become Emplaced or to remove Emplaced status. The Mission Defender may optionally identify this Item as Emplaced after it is deployed at the start of a Mission. When Emplaced; The Item is no longer assigned to a model though it can be used. This negates any [Laden] and other penalty traits. Provides effective +X STR for [Jitter] or [Recoil]. Any traits in list List become available.

[Emplace X].description: Asset. Must be Emplaced before it can be used. Requires X AP to become Emplaced or to remove Emplaced status. The Mission Defender may optionally identify this Item as Emplaced after it is deployed at the start of a Mission. When Emplaced; The Item is no longer assigned to a model though it can be used. This negates any [Laden] and other penalty traits. Provides effective +X STR for [Jitter] or [Recoil].

[Entropy!!].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Presume OR is 2 MU and ignore Visibility limit for the moment. Penalize -1 Damage per OR Multiple for Damage Tests.

[Entropy!].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Presume OR is 4 MU and ignore Visibility limit for the moment. Penalize -1 Damage per OR Multiple for Damage Tests.

[Entropy].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Presume OR is 8 MU and ignore Visibility limit for the moment. Penalize -1 Damage per OR Multiple for Damage Tests.

[Entropy+].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Presume OR is 16 MU and ignore Visibility limit for the moment. Penalize -1 Damage per OR Multiple for Damage Tests.

[Exit].description: After using this item, the character is removed from play but doesn’t count as being Eliminated.

[Feed X].description: Asset. Attack Effect. When resolving an Attacker Range Combat Damage Test involving ROF dice , if no successes were scored on any two of the Base dice, note which ROF dice are misses. Re-roll each X times, noting if they remain misses before discarding them. For each miss: Remove one of the ROF markers, and identify this weapon with an |Out-of-Ammo!| status marker if there isn’t already one. The weapon is not available again for use until this status is cleared via a Fiddle action.

[Fettered > Target].description: Intrinsic. Unchanging. Until released via a Fiddle action, this character must always remain within Cohesion of a character from assembly Assembly or else it may not activate. If no such character remains on the battlefield this character is Eliminated. Requires a Fiddle action by a character of Target while in base-contact to make Fettered again if released.

[Flex].description: Asset. Suit. (Should be Laden -1). If the Opposing Attacker tied or passes their Damage Test using a Weapon with an Impact rating of zero or has the Stun trait, this character receives at least 1 Delay token as Stun damage.

[Fodder].description: Intrinsic. Unchanging. Becomes Eliminated if KO’d. Automatically fails when selected for a Bottle Test. Hindrance penalties assigned to this model are -1 Base dice each instead of -1 Modifier dice each.

[Fragile X].description: Asset. If this Item was used for a Damage Test, and have lower Test Score, if there were no successes on the this player's dice, then the Item is Damaged. If already Damaged, then it is Destroyed. Presume the Test Score is lower by X. Damaged armor reduces its Armor trait by 3. Destroyed armor loses all of its Armor trait and reduces its Deflect trait. Destroyed weapons become Improvised weapons, and Destroyed equipment are removed from the game.

[Grenade X].description: Asset. This can be used as a Thrown weapon. See [Discard+], [Scatter X], [Reload], and Discrete. Must target a battlefield location as an Indirect Range Attack.

[Hafted].description: Penalized -1 Modifier die for Defender Close Combat Hit Tests.

[Hard-point X].description: Intrinsic. Creates X Hard-point Points. Each point allows one Item of choice which has the Mounted trait to be associated with this item. When this Item receives a Wound, roll a number of Modifier dice equal to 1 plus the number of Mounted Items. If all score a success, randomly determine which Item is destroyed and removed from its Hard-point.

[Hurried X].description: When this character is activated for the first time in the game perform a Unopposed INT Test at -X Modifier dice. If fail, delay the entry by a number of Turns equal to misses Begins first activation with +X Delay Tokens and will never start in Hidden status.

[Immobile].description: Intrinsic. May not perform Movement, use Agility, Bonus Actions, or actively reposition. An Immobile target is penalized -3 to Defender Combat Hit Test.

[Impaired].description: May not climb ladders, jump across or up. Treats staircases and inclines as Difficult Terrain. May not use a weapon. Visibility is never more than 6 MU. Disallowed Bonus and Fiddle actions.

[Inept!!].description: [Inept] Disallowed Pushing, Concentrate, Combined Action, and Rally. Disallowed Passive Player Options and React actions and React Tests.

[Inept!].description: [Inept] Disallowed Pushing, Concentrate, Combined Action, and Rally. Disallowed Bonus Actions.

[Inept].description: [Inept] Disallowed Pushing, Concentrate, Combined Action, and Rally.

[Jam X].description: Asset. Attack Effect. When resolving an Attacker Range Combat Hit Test involving ROF dice, if no successes were scored on any two of the Base dice, note which ROF dice are misses. Re-roll each X times, noting if they remain misses before discarding them. For each miss: Remove one of the ROF markers, and identify this weapon with an |Jammed!| status marker if there isn’t already one. The weapon is not available again for use until this status is cleared via a Fiddle action.

[Jitter!].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Requires an additional AP whenever the total ROF points used exceeds STR - 1during the attack.

[Jitter].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Requires an additional AP whenever the total ROF points used exceeds STR during the attack.

[Jitter+].description: Attack Effect. Asset. Requires an additional AP whenever the total ROF points used exceeds STR + 1 during the attack.

[Junk].description: Intrinsic. Asset:Firearm Weapon. When this item scores no successes on the Base dice for an Active Test, the item is marked with a Jammed! token and is unavailable for use again until that is cleared with a Fiddle action for 1 AP. When this item by any other conditions receives Out-of-Ammo! or Jammed! token, the item is no longer available for the remainder of the Mission.

[Laden X].description: Asset. Compare total 1 + Laden X from everything equipped to the character’s Physicality. Physicality is the higher of STR or SIZ. Each above is a burden. For each burden: Reduce MOV by 1 and recalculate Agility accordingly. Reduce REF by 1 and CCA by 1 unless Attentive Ordered. Reduce by 1 any Trait with the Movement keyword.

[Limbered].description: May be deployed 4 MU further than normal. Once deployed, this model may not move without being pushed or towed which is usually a Group Action.

[Lumbering].description: Intrinsic. For Situational Test Modifiers, when this model is Flanked, Cornered, or Confined, the penalty is a Base die each instead of a Modifier die each.

[Mail].description: Asset. Suit. When attacked by Bow weapons for a Range Combat Attack, reduce Armor Rating by 2. When attacked by [Hafted] Melee weapons in a Close Combat Attack, reduce Armor Rating by 1.

[Mindless!].description: Mind. Intrinsic. Puppet. Unnatural. See Expendable. Ignores Psychology traits. At the start of the Mission identify a non-Mindless Friendly model as the Designated Coordinator. If that Designated Coordinator is KO'd or Eliminated, another Friendly character on its Initiative may perform a Fiddle action to become the new Designated Coordinator. Unless began Initiative within Cohesion of a Designated Coordinator; must be marked as Done. The Designated Coordinator must be Attentive Ordered. Any targets for Attacks must be Revealed and within LOS.

[Mindless].description: Mind. Intrinsic. Puppet. Unnatural. See Expendable. Ignores Psychology traits. At the start of the Mission identify a non-Mindless Friendly model as the Designated Coordinator. If that Designated Coordinator is KO'd or Eliminated, another Friendly character on its Initiative may perform a Fiddle action to become the new Designated Coordinator. Unless began Initiative within Cohesion of a Designated Coordinator; must be marked as Done.

[Mindless+].description: Mind. Intrinsic. Puppet. Unnatural. See Expendable. Ignores Psychology traits. At the start of the Mission identify a non-Mindless Friendly model as the Designated Coordinator. If that Designated Coordinator is KO'd or Eliminated, another Friendly character on its Initiative may perform a Fiddle action to become the new Designated Coordinator. Unless began Initiative within Cohesion of a Designated Coordinator; must be marked as Done. Regarded as within Cohesion to Designated Coordinator if within LOS and Visibility OR. Use ORM 3 if Attentive.

[Misfire].description: Attack Effect. Asset. If the first Attacker Combat Test this Action does not pass with the Base dice showing no successes; Identify this weapon with a |Jammed!| token. Disallow use of the weapon again until this status is cleared with a Fiddle action. Regardless, if this Item is ever dropped into Water terrain, it may not be used again for the remainder of the Mission.

[Mounted X].description: Asset. See Emplaced. Begins as Emplaced unless otherwise stated by a Mission or Scenario. Ignores any |In Hand| traits such as [1H] or [2H]. While Emplaced, this Item is either assigned to a fixture at a battlefield location, or to a mount-point on an Automaton, Drone, or Vehicle. It moves with the whatever it is assigned to. While Emplaced, it may rotate its facing while in base-contact for 1 AP as a Fiddle action, but may not be repositioned or moved. Adjust any Fire-lane placement accordingly. Removing Emplaced status requires X + 1 AP to remove as a Fiddle action while in base-contact, but must be Free Attentive Ordered. While non-Emplaced, it is assigned [Laden X].

[Noise X].description: Intrinsic. Using this Item or Ability will generate a Noise level X representing Punctuated Noise. If not using the Punctuated Noise rules, treat [Noise 5] or higher as [Reveal], and ignore values which are less. See Punctuated Noise on page 55 for more information.

[Orbs X > Traits].description: Attack Effect. Energy. Targets may use Scramble! if qualified. Targets receive +X Base dice Defender Range Combat Hit Test, and another +1 Modifier die per ORM to target. Targets which fail the Hit Test are subject to trait Traits but reduce the trait levels by 1 per ORM.

[Paranoid X].description: Penalized -X Base dice all Rally attempts for this character. Whenever the Rally attempt fails this character acquires a Shaken token.

[Phobia X > Trait].description: See [Coward]. See [Fear X]. Whenever an Opposing character, item, or location has the Effect trait demonstrated or actively used; this character acquires the [Coward] and [Fear X] disabilities in regards to the location, item, or character of that Effect.

[Poor Shot X].description: Penalized -X Base dice Range Attack Tests using non-Thrown weapons. May never also be assigned a trait that provides bonuses for Range Attacks.

[Primitive].description: This character may only be assigned weapons named |Unarmed|, |Improvised|, |Bow|, |Club|, or |Spear|. May not use items identified Electronic. Limited to own species when designated as Leader.

[Prissy].description: Unless Attentive or Disordered, may not use Agility.

[Ravenous].description: Psychology or Intrinsic. If within Agility to a KO'd model, perform a Unopposed POW Test or must move into and remain in base-contact with that model until it has become Eliminated. Afterwards, ignore this disability for the remainder of the game.

[Re-animated].description: See [Beast].[Ravenous].[Solitary], Expendable and Supernatural. Never performs Morale Tests. Never have more than 1 AP and a single Wound. A KO'd Dangerous Zombie becomes Zombie. KO'd Zombie become Zombie Fragment. KO'd Zombie Fragment is Eliminated from play.

[Reckless].description: Psychology. Skill. All Friendly models in a Scrum which includes this model are penalized -1 Wild die Defender Close Combat Hit Tests. If multiple Friendly models have [Reckless], the remainder cause a penalty of -1 Modifier die Close Combat Hit Tests each.

[Recoil X].description: Unless Emplaced, compare Recoil to STR. If X exceeds STR, disallow use of this weapon. If X + 1 exceeds STR, require an extra AP to use. If X + 2 exceeds STR, acquire a Delay token after using the weapon.

[Reload X].description: Asset. See [1H]. After performing an action or a Test with this weapon and it is available for use; indicate that it needs to be reloaded using an Out-of-Ammo! marker. It remains unusable until after the character performs X Fiddle actions for 1 AP each.

[Requires > Type].description: Asset. Requires an Item of the type Type listed before it can be used. The type may also refer to a trait, such as Reach or [Grenade X], that an Item should have.

[Reveal].description: Intrinsic. After using this Item, a model is Revealed if it is within LOS of an Opposing model. If using the Punctuated Noise rules, this becomes [Noise 5].

[Safety].description: Must be Free Attentive and either in Cover or not in LOS. If Disordered or Panicked, must also satisfy Safety as defined for that status.

[Scatter X].description: Attack Effect. This weapon is always subject to the Scatter rules, the Indirect Range Attack Hit Test will always fail with an additional X misses.

[Selfless].description: Psychology. While Engaged to an Opposing model also Engaged with a Friendly model; any Damage received by that member may instead be given to this character when adjacent to target.

[Selfless > Target].description: See [Selfless]. Applies the Selfless trait only when target is of list List.

[Signature X].description: Hidden models using this Item remain Hidden unless within LOS of a character with the traits in list List. If any trait is prefixed with a plus (+) symbol, such as +Optics, then they must be within 16 MU.

[Slow!].description: May only use a single AP for non-Movement actions. If [Slow!] may never use the Rush action to receive an extra AP.

[Slow].description: May only use a single AP for non-Movement actions. If [Slow!] may never use the Rush action to receive an extra AP.

[Solitary].description: Never contributes to Morale Tests. Never receives bonus for Morale Tests from other models. Never test when a Friendly model is KO'd or Eliminated. Unless the character has the Leadership trait or there is no other option available to a player, characters with the [Solitary] trait can never be designated for Bottle tests or Initiative tests.

[Solo > List].description: Attack Effect. List of traits available for use when this character is Free and Attentive.

[Stay > List].description: While in base-contact with the target, this item benefits from the traits within list List.

[Stub].description: Attack Effect. May not use Overreach when attacking. Penalized -1 Modifier die Close Hit Tests unless in base-contact with only Opposing models using weapons with [Stub] for Close Combat. Passive characters in base-contact are not considered Engaged unless they also have [Stub].

[Stubborn].description: May not perform Group Actions. May not use Go points with this character.

[Stun-only].description: All Damage by this weapon causes Stun damage; one Delay token as Stun damage per success.

[Stupid].description: Unless the player won the Initiative for the Turn, pays an Initiative Point or Go Point, or this character is within Cohesion of an Attentive Friendly model with equal or higher INT it receives one less AP when Activated.

[Summon-bound > Classifier].description: Intrinsic. This model or Item may only be brought into a Mission when a character with the Summoner trait (the |Summoner|) activates it. This model is affected by the classifier Classifier keyword. When KO’d, Eliminated, or removed from play it may not be brought into play until the next Mission. It is Eliminated when the Summoner is KO’d or Eliminated. It is Eliminated if the Summoner performs a Fiddle action for 1 AP. It has an effective FOR reduced by 3, to a minimum of 0, for the entire duration of any Mission.

[Tethered].description: On its Initiative, it may not start new actions not already assigned to it. At the start of its Initiative, if it is in base-contact with an Attentive Ordered Friendly model; it may be assigned a new set of action and perform them against any target within Line-of-Sight (LOS) of both itself and its handler, or to continue a prior action against a target it had already encountered. It may not otherwise begin new actions on its own.

[Traversal!].description: Intrinsic. Intrinsic. Restricted to targeting models within a limited front-arc. Uses a bracketed OR which is written as its normal OR but within square-brackets such as [8 MU] or [16 MU]. Clearly identify a 90-degree front-arc of this model or Item. Penalized -1 per MOV of that target above the ORM. If [Traversal!], then targets are limited to within 45-degree front-arc. If [Traversal+] then it is a 180-degree front-arc. For this Item or ability, regarding Point-blank; any targets closer than the bracketed [OR] are -1 Base dice Range Attack Hit Test, and -1 Wild die when at half [OR] and less. Allow the front-arc to be rotated any amount as a Fiddle action when Attentive. If this is an Item, must be also be Free and in base-contact, and requires 1 AP.

[Treacherous].description: When this character is Eliminated as a result of acquiring too many Fear tokens; if it is within Visibility of an Attentive Ordered Opposing model with the Leader trait give control of this character to that player. Keep the model in play. The Opposing player now controls the model for the remainder of the Mission. Remove all but one of the Fear tokens. Mark the model as Done with 1 Delay token.

[Triggered].description: After using this item any Action performed by this model is inefficient. Identify the model with a Transfixed token. Optionally, perform a Fiddle action at any time to remove that specific token.

[Undisciplined].description: May never be assigned Tactics or Leadership traits. May never start a Group. Must be Attentive to become a member of any Group.

[Vehicle X].description: Intrinsic. This model is piloted by a Driver model which is Onboard. It begins Enabled, but can become toggle to Disabled! for 1 AP Fiddle action. A Driver may Deboard for 1 AP Fiddle action; place in base-contact. May Onboard if base-contact for 1 AP. Clearly the model’s Front and Rear arcs. During the Driver begins its Initiative, if the Vehicle is Enabled, add or remove Dash markers to the Vehicle up to its Sprint trait level either at its Front or Rear arc as its Dash arc. Move the Vehicle in a straight line through that arc up to its MOV plus Sprint as would any character. When this model performs Movement, it must first move at least X base-widths towards its Dash arc before turning up to MOV times, but limit them to 45-degrees each. If this Vehicle moves into or across another model, it will collide using the Dislodging Charge rules. If into a Wall or Obstacle, it will immediately stop before, and use the Falling rules to determine damage to itself and others. Each 1 AP the Driver spends will remove a Delay token assigned to the Vehicle. Each will cause -1 Modifier die every Test involving the Vehicle, excluding the Damage Test.

[Virtual].description: Intrinsic. See Discrete. May be targeted by a Dispell card or Counter-spell! action. Counts as one Spell effect. If this Item has the Magic trait, that counts as a sigil. If this Item has been assigned to an Attentive character with higher Sorcerer X or higher POW, it counts as one additional sigil per greatest value higher.

[Vitriol X].description: This character may never be deployed in Hidden or Wait status. When this character is activated for the first time in the game perform a Unopposed INT Test. If fail, a number of Friendly characters with POW equal to or less this character which are not Leaders acquire a Shaken token. The Shaken status is -1 Morale Test for the remainder of the Mission. Only those Friendly characters within Visibility OR are affected. Determine which randomly using dice.

[Vow].description: Opposing characters will never become Eliminated as a result of this character’s attacks but instead become KO'd. May never cause a KO’d character to become Eliminated.

[Weak-minded X].description: Psychology. Skill. While Distracted or Nervous, Opposed INT or POW Tests penalized -X Base dice.

[Weakness X > Trait].description: Intrinsic. Increases the penalizing effects of named keyword, action, trait, or Terrain in list List by X.

[Winged].description: Intrinsic. May not use Flight or Glide to enter Flying status unless Clear terrain surrounding it for one base-diameter in at least three directions, and in the direction of movement. When in Flying status, is penalized -1 Modifier die Range Combat Hit Tests. If using the Optional Rules for Wind, double the Wind Force before dividing. See the section on Wind and Flying Status for more information. (¤)

[Zucked X].description: Genetic. Requires +X Mana for Spellcasting or using Etheric, Magic, or Arcane Items. Any attacks against this character from Etheric, Magic, or Arcane require +X Mana.

Acid X.description: Attack Effect. After passing the Hit Test, if the target has effectively zero Armor Rating, assign the target one Acid token plus 1 per SIZ cascades spent. Receive X cascades for this purpose.

Acrobatic X.description: Genetic. Skill. Movement. Receive +X Wild dice Defender Close Combat Tests.

Advanced.description: Asset. Suit. (Should be Laden -1, and if Advanced+ then also Deflect +1)

Ammo X.description: Asset. Ignore the first X Out-of-Ammo! Dice. If there are remaining Out-of-Ammo! Dice; roll a die and score a success to keep if first use; otherwise reduce Ammo by 1 level, discarding if it becomes level 0. If in base-contact with an Emplaced weapon, other models also in base-contact with it may use this model’s Ammo X trait.

Amorphous X.description: Intrinsic. Psychic. Genetic. While Attentive, has X additional |Hands|, and Reach X. May perform any Action not involving movement or reposition as though it were up to X MU away. Penalize any Tests with DR equal to the MU distance used. May reposition through porous terrain up to X MU thick while in base-contact. Players should agree and declare which terrain elements are porous, such as Doors, Windows, Bushes, etc.

Amphibious.description: Genetic. Upgrade Terrain effects on movement upon Water by one per: Difficult > Rough > Clear. Treat Deeps terrain as Rough instead of Impassable. When in Deeps terrain, or Shallows X terrain if X is greater than SIZ: May perform Hide action at the end of Initiative. May not perform Range Combat Attacks or Detect while Hidden. While Attentive when targeted at beyond Point-blank Range receive +1 Modifier die Range Combat Defender Hit Test per OR above the first. While Attentive beyond Visibility presume in Hard Cover.

Analytics.description: Analytics — Announce the option to use Analytics action for the next Test involving this character. Costs 1 AP to perform the action. After acquiring all dice for the test, do not roll them but sum them as follows;  Every 2 Modifier dice is +1 success. Every 2 Base dice is +2 success. Every 2 Wild dice is +3 successes, and carry-over. Every 4 dice is of any kind is +1 successes, and one carry-over of choice.

Anti-electric X.description: Attack Effect. AoE. Attenuation. If target has the Electric keyword, receive +1 X. Have target perform an Unopposed Test at -X Modifier dice. Upon fail, for every miss, it must disable one Item with the Electronic or Electric keyword for the remainder of the Mission. This may include itself. Have target perform an Unopposed FOR Test at -X Modifier dice DR REF of the target. Upon fail, the target acquires a Delay token per miss.

Anti-magic X.description: Attack Effect. Magic. AoE. Attenuation. Have target perform an Unopposed Test at -X Modifier dice. For every miss, it must disable one Items with the Magic keyword for the remainder of the Mission. Have target perform an Unopposed POW Test at -X Modifier dice DR Discord of the target. Upon fail, the target acquires a Delay token per miss. Target may use INT if it is higher.

Anti-psionic X.description: Attack Effect. Psychic. AoE. Attenuation. Have target perform an Unopposed Test at -X Modifier dice. For every miss, it must disable one Items with the Psychic keyword for the remainder of the Mission. Have target perform an Unopposed POW Test at -X Modifier dice. Upon fail, the target acquires a Delay token per miss.

Archer X.description: Skill. Improves use of Bow weapons as follows: Receive bonus X Modifier dice for the Attacker Range Combat Tests, and reduce [Reload] penalty by X in total for Bow weapons |In Hand|.

Armor X.description: Intrinsic. Reduce any Wound Damage received by X; also known as +X |Armor Rating|; therefore +X AR. Weapon’s Impact rating [I] reduces total AR by an equivalent amount. If a character is attacked by a Concentrated Attack, reduce 3 AR from each item Type with the Armor trait.

Augment X > List.description: Provides a maximum level multiplier of X for traits, attributes, and disabilities in list List. At the start of an activation note the level used; it may be increased or decreased by one. Each level used multiplies the effect of the traits in list List. Any disability activated take effect at the end of the action. If there are multiple disabilities listed, each is associated with a single level used plus the prior level if any. BP cost is 5 plus the sum of costs for traits in list List.

Aura X > List.description: Aura X > Traits — AoE. Aura OR is 1 MU. Specify a target location. All models within LOS and X ORM are targets. Reduce X by 1 for each ORM to a target for effective X. All targets are subject to the traits Traits, but only up to the level equal to the effective X.

Aware X.description: While Attentive, increase this character’s Cohesion distance by X MU when Hidden, and 4 + 2X MU when not Hidden.

Bash.description: Asset. May use this as an Improvised Melee weapon. Receive +1 cascade for Bonus Actions after passing the Attacker Close Combat Test if used Charging and is in base-contact with the target.

Battery X:Type > List.description: Intrinsic. Electronic. Provides X Battery points at the start of this character’s Initiative which can be used to temporarily improve the associated Item's abilities until its next Initiative. An Item with access to multiple Battery traits keeps how they are available to be spent separate. While the Battery isn't disabled, each of the traits in list List are always available even if none of the Battery points have been spent. Within list List, each Battery point spent increases all traits within it. Each Battery point may instead be spent to receive +1 Base die for a test normally involving the Item. If a Weapon then it is for the Damage Test. If Armor then it is for the Hit or Damage Test. If Equipment then it is for a non-Combat Test.

Beacon X > Target.description: Any Friendly model with trait Target or matching archetype Target may use this as a beacon; it behaves as though it were at this object’s location.

Believer X > Belief.description: Psychology. Skill. Character is an overt Believer of belief Belief. This provides bonuses and penalties to Defender Tests involving the |Psychology| keyword, such as Fear tests. While Attentive, receives +X Base dice Defender Tests involving the keyword |Psychology|, unless that source of Psychology has the same belief. Default it does not. While Distracted or Nervous, penalized -X Base dice Defender Tests involving the keyword |Psychology| if that source of Psychology has the same belief. Default it does not.

Bite X.description: See Cleave. See [Stub]. This trait may be used to attack as though it were a Natural weapon. Penalized -X Modifier dice for Close Combat Hit Tests, but receive +X Impact and +X Modifier dice for the Attacker Close Combat Damage Test.

Blast X.description: AoE. Attenuation. Explosion. Attack Effect. Blast Effect is X. Place a reminder pawn at the location for the source of the attack. Check all models within LOS as targets. If the distance from the source to a target is 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, or 8 MU, reduce Blast Effect by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6. If there are any intervening Wall or Blocking terrain along the LOF to the target, reduce Blast Effect by 1, 2, 3, 4, etc. for having 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2 MU, etc. of Blast protection. If there is a Blast Effect of at least zero for a given target, then have it perform an Unopposed FOR Test as a Blast Test, using DR equal to the Blast Effect. Upon fail, each miss causes 1 Delay token to be assigned to the target as Stun damage.

Blinding X.description: Attack Effect. AoE. Blinding OR is 3 + X MU. Reduce effective X per ORM. If effective X is at least zero, then all models within range must perform an Unopposed REF Test. Use DR of effective X. Upon failure, assign the target a Blinded token, plus 1 per 3 misses. And assign a Delay token if one isn't already present.

Bombproof X.description: Intrinsic. Suit. Reduces X Burn, X Blast, and X Frag it receives.

Bonus:Melee X > Action.description: Receive +X cascades for Bonus Actions in Set after passing Close Combat Hit Test

Bonus:Range X > Action.description: Receive +X cascades for Bonus Actions in Set after passing Range Combat Hit Test

Boxer.description: Receive +1 Attacker Close Combat Tests if using Concentrate and not in a Scrum. Receive the +1 Stun trait if the Opposing model is within 1 SIZ of this model.

Brace.description: If this is a consecutive attack with the same weapon against one or more targets within the last LOF , receive +1 Wild die for Attacker Hit Test.

Brawl X.description: Skill. Whenever performing Bonus Actions for Close Combat, receives +X cascades. If Opposing model has Brawl trait, reduce both levels by the lower amount. If Attentive and Engaged, acquire a Delay token to perform Bonus Actions despite failing the Attacker Close Combat Test; do this after a target’s Passive Player Options.

Brawn X.description: Receive +X STR except for Attacker Close Combat Damage Tests.

Bulletproof.description: Intrinsic. Unless the Attacker used the Concentrate action while within Visibility, Reduces 3 Wound damage received when targeted by Firearm weapons for a Combat Test. The amount is the lower of the Armor Rating or 3, but will reduce at least one Wound damage. If there are multiple Items with Bulletproof, use the one with the highest Armor Rating.

Burn X.description: Attack Effect. After passing the Hit Test, assign the target one Burned token per SIZ cascades spent, but at least 1 cascade. Receive X cascades for this purpose.

Burrow X.description: Perform a Fiddle action +X Modifier dice Unopposed STR Test to become Underground; mark accordingly and removing any Burrowing markers. Otherwise mark as Burrowing ; each is +1 Modifier die for the next attempt. When in Underground status this model can’t be targeted except by adjacent models that are also Underground. While Underground can relocate to any position on the board with X × 6 MU. Perform a Fiddle action and a successful +X Modifier dice Unopposed STR Test to re-surface. Otherwise mark with a Burrow token; each is +1 Modifier die for the next attempt. Upon pass remove the status markers and place the model within X × 2 MU.

Burst X.description: For the current Range Combat Attack; X randomly selected models which are within X × 1 MU behind the target along LOF, or in base-contact to very first target of the attack, are also attacked if within LOS. Use the same Attacker's dice roll for the Hit Test for each. If Burst > Trait, then all targets are affected by the trait Trait when the Attacker Range Combat Test passes.

Burst X > Trait.description: For the current Range Combat Attack; X randomly selected models which are within X × 1 MU behind the target along LOF, or in base-contact to very first target of the attack, are also attacked if they within LOS. Use the same Attacker's dice roll for Hit Test for each. If Burst > Trait, then all targets are affected by the trait Trait when the Attacker Range Combat Test passes.

Cast X > Target.description: Spend 1 AP to activate trait Target to self. The trait Target stays active until this character's next Initiative. See Casting Spells for more information.

Caustic X.description: Attack Effect. Permanently reduce Armor of target by X. If target effectively has no Armor Rating when it is attacked, it acquires 1 Acid token per X.

Celerity X.description: Virtuosity. Receives +X Action Points whenever it receives the Initiative to be spent on non-Movement actions. Stun damage converts to Wounds only after 2 + X Delay tokens have been assigned.

Charge.description: When Attentive, receive +1 Wild die Attacker Damage Test and +1 Impact if this used with the |Charge| bonus. See Performing Movement Action for more information.

Charismatic X > Target.description: If Ordered and of the highest level X within Cohesion or Visibility and LOS, award all Friendly Attentive Believers of belief Target with +1 Wild die for Morale Tests and +1 Modifier die for Combat Hit Tests. No more than one Charismatic may provide this benefit to any Believer at a time.

Chase X.description: Genetic. If Free and Attentive and an Opposing model within Visibility moves away; optionally reposition this model towards it up to MOV × X MU. Allow this once per Action. Double the reposition if acquire a Delay token.

Claws X.description: See [Stub]. This trait may be used to attack as though it were a Natural weapon. Receive +X Wild dice for the Attacker Close Combat Damage Test.

Cleave X.description: Attack Effect. If target of the Attacker Damage Test is KO'd it is instead Eliminated. If X is two or more, presume target has first received an extra X -1 Wounds.

Climb.description: Upgrade Obstacle terrain effects on movement; Impassable > Difficult when climbing upwards, and Impassable > Rough when climbing down. When climbing Walls or Terrain but not entirely clearing that obstacle; indicate position with a marker. While upon that obstacle, penalized -1 Wild die Combat Tests.

Cloud X > Type.description: AoE. See Gas > Type. Place 3 equally spaced size X Gas markers of type Type in base-contact with the target location. Use the Unbiased Scatter diagram to place the first marker. Effectively reduce X by 1 and place 2 more Gas markers of the effective size X in base-contact to each of those. While the effective X is at least 1, repeat above.

Cockpit X.description: This model allows one model with at least INT 2 to enter it as a |Pilot|, changing this model's status to Piloted. The Pilot model must be of SIZ -3 or smaller. While Piloted, when this model is Eliminated so is the Pilot model. While Piloted, the model uses a mix of its own attribute values and the Pilot's. This model's CCA, RCA, and REF is the lower of its own attribute value plus X, as compared to the Pilot's matching attribute value. The Pilot's INT and POW are used when necessary, with the Pilot receiving +1 POW for each SIZ this model is larger than an opponent for Opposed Fear tests. When this model takes damage, examine the Attacker's Base dice; any carry-over not matched by the Defender's dice will apply a Delay token as Stun damage against the Pilot. The Pilot may enter or exit from or to base-contact for 2 AP as a Fiddle action.

Codex X.description: Begins the game with X Codex points to be spent during game-play. Each Codex point spent assigns a Spellcaster character one level of a desired Spell from its Spell Codex. Codex points may also be spent to receive +1 Mana point for any Spells.

Conceal.description: Asset. One of this item may always be assigned to a model despite its sculpt.

Cone X > Trait.description: Cone OR is X × 1 MU. Do perform Range Combat Hit Test, but instead pick a battlefield location at half Weapon's OR or greater. Any Attentive Free models with equal or higher REF may reposition up to Agility away by acquiring a Delay token. For every ORM reduce Cone OR by 1. All targets within LOS and within Cone OR of that location are automatically Hit and are subject to trait Trait.

Confuse X.description: Attack Effect. Psychology. If target is Hit, have it perform an Unopposed Test using the higher of its INT or POW. Upon pass, assign the target one Confused token and one more per 3 cascades. Receive X cascades for this purpose.

Construct:Energy X > List.description: Intrinsic. see Overload X. Spend 1 AP and place a Energy Construct token in base-contact with the character; it has been manifested and attached. While attached, it will provide the traits identified in list List to the character. Whenever this character is to receive Wound damage, it may instead remove a Energy Construct token it manifested. A character may target an Opposing Energy Construct during Close or Range Combat at DR X; if the Attacker test passes, then remove the target Energy Construct token. Apply +1 DR if the Attack Effect doesn’t match this Construct.

Construct:Magic X > List.description: Intrinsic. Magic. see Overload X. Spend 1 AP and place a Magic Construct token in base-contact with the character; it has been manifested and attached. While attached, it will provide the traits identified in list List to the character. Whenever this character is to receive Wound damage, it may instead remove a Magic Construct token it manifested. A character may target an Opposing Construct during Close or Range Combat at DR X; if the Attacker test passes, then remove the target Magic Construct token. Apply +1 DR if the Attack Effect doesn’t match this Construct.

Construct:MEMSic X > List.description: Intrinsic. Energy. see Overload X. Spend 1 AP and place a MEMSic Construct token in base-contact with the character; it has been manifested and attached. While attached, it will provide the traits identified in list List to the character. Whenever this character is to receive Wound damage, it may instead remove a MEMSic Construct token it manifested. A character may target an Opposing MEMSic or Energy Construct during Close or Range Combat at DR X; if the Attacker test passes, then remove the target MEMSic Construct token. Apply +1 DR if the Attack Effect doesn’t match this Construct.

Construct:Psi X > List.description: Intrinsic. Psionic. see Overload X. Spend 1 AP and place a Psychic Construct token in base-contact with the character; it has been manifested and attached. While attached, it will provide the traits identified in list List to the character. Whenever this character is to receive Wound damage, it may instead remove a Psychic Construct token it manifested. A character may target an Opposing Psychic or MEMSic Construct during Close or Range Combat at DR X; if the Attacker test passes, then remove the target Construct token. Apply +1 DR if the Attack Effect doesn’t match this Construct.

Controller X > Target.description: Intrinsic. Skill. Paired with targets in list List, all which must be Automatons or Drones, to provide these benefits: Spend 1 AP to change status between Enabled or Disabled! for up to X targets from List if within LOS. Spend 1 AP to remove a Delay token for up to X Automaton targets from List. Spend 1 AP to start a Group Action limited to targets from List, allowing up to X Group Members. All must be within LOS of this Controller. Once per Turn, when a target from List receives a Bonus Action, the Refresh bonus to remove a Delay token may be taken by this Controller instead.

Coverage X.description: Asset. Skill. For each X ignore one Engaged Opposing model in a Scrum. When Attentive allow up to X Friendly models in base-contact and Engaged to the same Opposing model to benefit from this Item this Turn.

Cycle X.description: Asset. After the Combat Hit Test passes, it automatically passes for the next X Attacks. This resets when attacking another target or if the current target moves beyond Weapon ORM 2.

Damper X > Type.description: Ignores X of any trait which has the keyword Type.

Death-grip.description: If this character is KO’d or Eliminated while in base-contact with Opposing models, keep this model in play until the end of the game-turn. A single Opposing model of choice in base-contact is penalized -1 Modifier die for any Tests for the remainder of this Turn, and receives 1 Delay token.

Deflect X.description: Asset. Receives +X Modifier dice Defender Hit Tests. Disregard for Defender Range Hit Test when Engaged. Disregard if attack is a Firearm weapon unless this item also has the Bulletproof trait. Disregard if attack has Pierce unless this item also has Hardened. Disregard if attack has Explosion unless this item also has Bombproof.

Deploy X.description: Deploy as a Friendly model during the Deployment Step of any Mission, up to X × 4, X × 6, or X × 8 MU away from the Entry edge or corner for a Small, Medium, or Large battlefield.

Detect X.description: Intrinsic. Skill. Receive +X Base dice performing Attacker Detect Tests. Maximum OR Multiple for Detect Tests increased by X.

Dice X: Base > List.description: Receive +X Modifier dice for the listed Tests

Dice X: Modifier > Tests.description: Receive +X Base dice for the listed Tests

Dice X: Wild > List.description: Receive +X Wild dice for the listed Tests

Discrete.description: Asset. Any number of this item may always be assigned to a model despite its sculpt.

Displace X.description: If Attentive when targeted for a Range Attack, first displace X × 1 MU. Ignore X Suppression markers. This model may perform attacks as though it were displaced up to Visibility but X × 4 MU from its current position. That position must be within LOS of the intended target.

Disrupt X.description: Attack Effect. Explosion. Examine total successes for the Blast Test regardless of if it passed or failed. Presume there are X additional successes. Reposition targets directly away 1 MU if total successes exceeds SIZ, and another 1 MU for every 3 additional successes. If the repositioned model hits a Wall, or an Obstacle of equal or greater SIZ, stop before that and then assign a Delay token as Stun damage for each MU remaining.

Egovoid X.description: Attack Effect. Psychic. Any target with Items having the Psychic, Psychic, or Etheric keywords or must perform an Unopposed Test at -X Modifier dice. For every miss, it must disable one of those Items for the remainder of the Mission.

Eject.description: When Eliminated, any Pilot model that has entered this model is not Eliminated but is instead repositioned using Biased Scatter away. The distance is equal to this model's SIZ plus the successes scored on SIZ Modifier dice. Mark the position where the Pilot would land; it is Eliminiated if this is off the battlefield. The Pilot lands at the start of the next Turn during its Owner's Initiative with 2 Delay tokens plus one more for each 1 MU scored on the Modifier dice.

Energize X > Target.description: See trait Target. Increases the level of trait Target by X. Can increase the level by up to two; for each increase either spend an extra AP, or if Attentive acquire a Delay token. The BP cost of this trait is equal to 2 + half of trait Target, times X.

Entangle X.description: Intrinsic. Perform an  MUEntangle MU Bonus Action after performing the Attacker Hit Test. Spend cascades equal to target SIZ to assign a Entangle marker to the target; presume +X cascades for this purpose. Allow this multiple times, but limit to X Entangle markers per item with this trait.

Envirosuit X > List.description: Asset. See Resist X > Bio-hazard. Reduces effects of every keyword or trait in list List by X. Loses trait after receiving a X Wounds caused by attacks that have an Impact rating, or which have the Cleave, Impale, or Pierce traits.

Evasive X.description: Genetic. Skill. Movement. Receive +X Modifier dice per OR Multiple for Defender Range Combat Hit Tests. Once per Turn, if Attentive Free after being targeted for a Range Attack, may reposition X × 1 MU and allow use of any Agility for any or all of that distance. If combined with repositioning as a result of being Revealed, Agility can be used for just one or the other. If the attack has the option to use ROF, place those markers afterwards.

Exert X > List.description: Intrinsic. At any time, acquire up to X hindrances of any type from list Hindrances. For each Hindrance acquired, increase one of the non-Disability traits associated with this Item. Optionally, as a Fiddle action, may instead remove up to X hindrances in list Hindrances by reducing all traits in list List.

Expendable.description: Intrinsic. Unchanging. Do not count nor consider for Bottle Test calculations. Never causes non-Expendable characters to perform Morale Tests when KO’d or Eliminated. Never provides bonuses to non-Expendable characters for Morale Tests.

Extra-arms X.description: Intrinsic. Has X additional hands ( MUHands MU). If X is 2-3, 4-7, or 8 and higher; then receive 1, 2, or 3 Arm AP. Arm AP may only be spent on Fiddle and Combat Actions. For each Arm AP used, the character is penalized -1 Modifier die for all Fiddle Tests and Combat Tests.

Fear X.description: Psychic. AoE. Psychology. Skill. Amoral. Unnatural. Fear range is X × 1 MU. Once per Initiative, as an option if Attentive Ordered, at the end of this model’s Action; all Opposing models within Fear range and LOS must perform an -X Modifier die Fear Test. All targets must perform this Test. Reduce X by 1 per MU beyond this model’s base-diameter. The Test is required up to Fear range at X zero. Any Active Opposing models which attempt to move or reposition to within Fear range and LOS of this model must perform a -X Modifier die Morale Test. Apply any Hindrances affecting this model. Upon failure disallow the Active model to become any closer this Action. Upon pass, allow the model to continue. If Opposing models have the Fear trait, reduce X by the lower rating of either model.

Fencer X.description: Skill. Melee weapons without the [2H] trait receive +X Impact. If Attentive and not in a Scrum receive the Reach trait (see Reach) and further reduce X Armor Rating from each Armor Type used by Defender.

Field X.description: Causes -X Modifier dice when performing Detect or attacking using weapons with the Energy trait. Provides +X Wild dice when targeted for a Hit Test by weapons with the Energy trait. Reduce Damage received by weapons with the Fire, Explosive, or Energy traits by X successes.

Fight X.description: Skill. Reduce up to X penalty Modifier dice for Close Combat Hit Tests. When Attentive, for each level of Fight higher than the Opposing character, allow an additional Bonus Action for the Attack action. These additional Bonus Actions may not have already been performed during this Action.

Fire X.description: Attack Effect. Receive X Fire points to place Fire markers before resolving the Attacker Damage Test. Place at the target one or more Fire markers by spending Fire points. These are 0.5, 1, 2, or 3 MU in diameter for 1, 2, 3, or 4 Fire points. Fire markers must be placed no further than X MU from any other Fire marker already placed by this attack.

Fire-lane.description: This weapon qualifies to use the Fire-lane rules.

Fireproof X.description: Ignores the effects of X Burn markers it has been assigned, and reduces any effects from Fire by X dice.

Flight X.description: When the model is activated, identify if it is in Flying status or not. For each AP spent in Flying status, it may ignore all terrain and obstacles for Movement. While in Flying status increase Movement per action by X × 6 MU, and presume MOV is X higher than normal for Disengage action and Bonus Actions.

Focused X.description: Considered Attentive with up to X additional Delay tokens. When taking Stun damage, increase the limit by up to X additional Delay tokens before converting to Wound damage. At the start of this character’s Initiative, it may remove X Delay tokens before reducing Action Points.

Formless.description: Ignore any attack that isn't Magic, Fire, or Explosives.

Frag X.description: AoE. Attenuation. Attack Effect. See [Noise 1 + X]. The Frag Effect is X and the Frag OR is 1 MU. Check all models within LOS as potential targets. If the distance from the source to a target is 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, or 8 MU, the Attenuation is 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6. Perform a Direct Range Attack by the System player on behalf of the weapon, which is a SIZ 0 Attacker. Exclude Situational Test Modifiers for Blind, Distance, Leaning, and Obscured. Reduce the Frag Effect by the Attenuation. If the effective Frag Effect is at least zero, then have each target perform an Unopposed REF Test as the Hit Test. The System player receives +1 Modifier die per Frag Effect. Each target which failed the Hit Test must perform an Unopposed FOR Test as the Damage Test. Apply any carryovers from the Hit Test. Reduce the target's Armor Ratings as though this were a Concentrated attack. The System player receives +1 Modifier die and +1 Impact per Frag Effect, as well as any Damage Rating and Impact for the weapon. If the distance to a target is 1 MU or less, then presume that this Attack is Concentrated, awarding a Wild die for the Damage Test. For those targets which failed the Hit Test apply traits Traits, but reduce the trait levels by the Attenuation.

Frenzy.description: Receives +1 Wild die Close Combat Hit Test if this character or its target in base-contact is Wounded.

Fume X > Type.description: AoE. See Gas > Type. Place a Fume marker at the target location. It is a Fume of type Gas > Type. Place a small Fume die showing 1 + X pips next to the Fume marker. The Fume is now in Spreading status.

Gas > Type.description: Gas. AoE. Attack Effect. If a model is within 1 MU of this Gas marker, perform the following. There is no need for any Hit Combat Test; all targets automatically fail, generating one cascade for any trait effects. If a trait associated with this Gas requires a Damage Test, have each perform it as an Unopposed Test using the higher of their FOR or SIZ. Apply DR 1 for each additional Gas marker of the same type within 1 MU.

Genius X.description: Receive +X Base dice for all Tests normally using INT except the Initiative Test.

Glide X.description: Intrinsic. When the model is activated and moves from a higher location upon the battlefield towards a lower location, it may enter Flying status and so identify it as such. When using Movement, it may move up to X × 2 MU in a straight line for every 1 MU descended, or increase altitude by half of X × 1 MU for every 1 MU moved. If no AP were spent by this model on Movement, at the end of this model’s Initiative it automatically moves forward SIZ × 1 MU and descends SIZ × 1 MU. The direction taken is up to the player. If using the Wind rules, effectively reduce SIZ by 1 at Wind Rating 2+, 6+, and 15+. When in Flying status, penalized -1 Modifier die Range Combat Hit Test.

Gore X.description: See [Stub]. See Impale. This trait may be used to attack as though it were a Natural weapon. Receive Impact +X. Penalized -X Modifier dice Close Combat Hit Test. If used with Charge bonus; receive +1 Wild die Attacker Close Combat Damage Test and +1 Impact, and may use SIZ instead of STR.

Grit X.description: Psychology. Skill. Does not perform a Morale Test when a Friendly model is KO’d or Eliminated unless that model had higher POW. Reduce the first Fear token received when Attetntive. Whenever receiving Fear tokens optionally convert up to X of those Fear tokens into Delay tokens instead.

Gunslinger X.description: Skill. Improves use of Firearm weapons as follows: Receive bonus X Modifier dice for the Attacker Range Combat Tests, and reduce [Reload] penalty by X in total for Firearm weapons |In Hand|.

Hardened X.description: Intrinsic. Also known as HR or |Hardness Rating|. If effective HR is at least 1, the Concentrate action doesn't reduce Armor Rating by 3 unless in base-contact with Attacker. When targeted for any attack;  reduce X + 1 Impact reduce X + 1 Damage received and then convert up to X + 1 remaining Damage to instead become Stun damage.

Hatred X > List.description: Psychology. Skill. Specify a named Champion, named Archetype, named Assembly, named Faction, or named Belief. Must move into within first ORM, or into base-contact and perform an Attack action if member of list List is within Visibility. Receive +X Modifier die Attacker Hit Test and any Morale Tests involving target Name. May attack KO’d targets if they match name Name.

Heal X.description: Magic. Skill. Bio-agent. Leader. Receive +X Wild dice for the Revive action but use the higher of this character's INT or the target's FOR. Upon pass may also, for every 2 cascades spent; remove a Fear, Burn, Confused, or Poison token.

Healthy X.description: Receives +X FOR for all Tests normally involving FOR except the Damage Test.

Heat X.description: Attack Effect. Thermal. AoE. Any target of this attack is effectively in base-contact with X Fire markers for purposes of performing a Scorch Test.

Hivemind X > Name.description: Genetic. Character is a Hive Member of the Hivemind named Name. Hivemind members of the same name benefit as follows: For Group Actions, models with the same Hivemind name as the Group Leader cost zero to become a Group Follower. Hive Cohesion to any Friendly Hivemind model of the same name is Cohesion × X and does not require LOS if within half. When performing Morale Tests, use any Friendly Hivemind model within the Hive Cohesion of the same name. Any Fear tokens or Delay tokens received may be distributed to any Friendly Hivemind models of same name within Hive Cohesion.

Hold X.description: Intrinsic. Receive +X cascades to perform the Held Bonus Action. The Held status can’t be removed by an Opposing model unless it spends an additional X cascades. If the target also has Hold trait, reduce the levels of each by the amount of the lesser.

Holy X.description: While Ordered reduces Spell Effect, and the Fear, Supernatural, and Unholy traits within POW × 1 MU by X. If in base-contact while Attentive, reduce by an additional 1. If assigned to a Ranged Weapon (Bow, Firearm, Thrown, Throwable) the Holy ability applies at the target of an attack presuming half POW.

Horrifying X.description: Intrinsic. Psychology. See Fear X. Behaves like the Fear X trait. Disregard this trait entirely if the Opposing model has the Fear or Horrifying traits. Disregard this trait entirely unless the Opposing model is Distracted and also in Nervous, Hidden or Wait status. If there are at least 2, 5, or 10 models with the Horrifying trait within Visibility, apply a further penalty to the Opposing model of -1m, -2m, or -3m. A model with both the Horrifying and Fear traits adds their levels together unless Horrifying is disregarded.

Immortal X.description: While level is 1 or greater; never considered Eliminated, merely KO'd. Unless Eliminated as a result of having at least X + 4 Fear tokens.

Impact X.description: Attack Effect. Increases the weapon’s Impact rating by +X. This reduces a target’s total Armor Rating.

Impale.description: Distracted targets are penalized -1 Base die Defender Damage Test plus 1 per 3 Impact remaining. Use the lowest amount of Impact remaining for Defender if it had multiple types of Armor.

Incorporeal.description: Ignore any attack unless it is Magic.

Indomitable X.description: Receive +X Base dice POW Tests. Allow once per Mission. When about to become KO’d or Eliminated as a result of Wound damage, perform an Unopposed POW Test. Upon pass, replace up to cascades any Wound damage received with Delay tokens. Afterwards, determine if KO’d or Eliminated.

Infect X > Type.description: Attack Effect. Intrinsic. Bio-agent. Useful only after a Mission concludes during a Campaign game. Regard the character as having been KO’d. If 1 + X is greater than character’s SIZ, regard it as having been Eliminated instead. Target must perform a Medical Test at -X Wild dice. When using Thematic Injuries, use type Type if it is listed, otherwise the default type is |Poison|. If Opposing models have the Infect trait of the same Type, reduce X by the lower rating experienced by either model.

Infiltrate X.description: Skill. Do not deploy this model during the Deployment Step of any Mission and reserve it for the following Infiltration step. Create second Deployment step named |Infiltrate step|, and following the same order of deployment as before. Deploy Infiltrate models during the Infiltrate step up to X × 4, X × 6, or X × 8 MU their own Entry edge or corner for a Small, Medium, or Large battlefield if to Cover or to out of LOS. Models which also have the Stealthy or Sneaky traits add their levels to X. All Sides re-deploy models beginning with the lowest X first, followed by all models with next higher X, etc. Models deploy as Hidden and in Wait status. Models may not deploy within LOS and Visibility of an Opposing model.

Insane X.description: Psychology. Amoral. Unless has X or more Hindrance token types, is not affected by any trait with the Psychology keyword and does not perform any Morale Tests. Not affected by Hindrance penalties for Morale Tests. When targeted, reduce by X levels any trait with both the Magic and Psychology keywords. Reduces up to 3 misses received from Sanity Tests when using the Magic action. Optionally reduce Punctuated Noise created when receiving Fear tokens by X. (¤)

Intense X.description: Psychology. Skill. Virtuosity. While Attentive Ordered and using Concentrate receive an additional +X for any Tests.

Investigator X.description: Award +1 RP if have the highest total Investigator levels in play. When using Resource or Tactics cards and a die roll is required; roll X additional dice and pick the results of the most favorable die.

Invisibility X.description: May use Hide action even without Cover. Automatically becomes Hidden at the start of any character’s Initiative while Free. Do not remove this model’s Hidden status unless a Detect Test is first performed and passed. This model may not become Engaged nor targeted for an Attack until Revealed. Opposing characters with Invisibility, Detect, or Sensors automatically reduce this character’s Invisibility level by a similar amount for purposes of allowing this character to be Engaged or targeted for an Attack.

Jammer X > Trait.description: AoE. Jammer OR is equal to X × 8 MU. Reduce X by 1 per Jammer ORM. All models that are within range of the Jammer which have traits in list List reduce them by X.

Kick X.description: Natural Weapon. See [Stub]. This trait may be used to attack as though it were a Natural weapon. Penalized -X Base dice Attacker Close Combat Hit Test. The Attacker Close Combat Damage Test causes Stun damage. Receive +1 Modifier die per Sprint level if began Action with target in Melee Range. Receives +X cascades for the Push-back Bonus Action as the only choice allowed.

Knife-fighter X.description: Skill. When Attentive and in base-contact while using a Weapon that has the Silent keyword, receive +X Base dice and +X Impact Close Combat Tests. If using Punctuated Noise, the weapon will generate Noise 1 instead of Noise 2. (¤)

Lash X.description: Natural Weapon. See Thresh. This trait may be used to attack as though it were a Natural weapon. May target models up to X × 1 MU distant if there is LOS to them. Causes X Damage as Stun damage. However, any Lash attacks require 2 AP when Engaged. Receives +X cascades if perform the Push-back or Pull-back Bonus Actions. If Distracted, disallow an attack with this weapon if target is in base-contact.

Leadership X.description: Psychology. Skill. Leader. Friendly models within Visibility of this character receives bonus +X Base dice for all Morale Tests. Those models may not receive such a bonus from more than one character with the Leadership trait per Test. Increase by X the number of Friendly Ready Ordered models within Cohesion which can become Group Members. May start a Group at no cost if using Group Actions. Requires Agenda Cards; When assigning Agenda cards, qualify to receive an additional card. (²)

Leap X.description: Genetic. Increase Agility by +X MU. Must be used at either the start or end of a Movement action or reposition.

Leash X.description: This character is a Handler and may identify up to REF Friendly models as starting the Mission in Leashed status to it. Each must be of the same or less Physicality than the Handler; presume Handler’s Physicality is at +X. Specifically has the Leadership trait limited to those Leashed models. Any Leashed models can never be more than X MU away from the Handler. Automatically removed Leashed status on a model if it is Disordered, or if the Handler is Distracted Disordered or not In-Play. As a Fiddle action, the Handler may remove Leashed status on one or more models which it has Leashed. Each Leashed model requires [1H]. Doing so will assign the Handler the [Lumbering] trait. As a Fiddle action, the Handler may remove Leashed status on one or more models which it has Leashed. As Fiddle action for 1 AP, the Handler may cause a previously Leashed model to be again in Leashed status if it is in base-contact.

Leech X.description: Magic. Skill. Bio-agent. Provide a new Leech Bonus Action to be used upon passing Attacker Close Combat Damage Test with a Natural weapon that has Impact greater than zero. Convert up to X Wounds the target receives into Stun damage or a Delay token, and this model removes either a Wound, Delay, Poison, Fear, or Dazed token.

Light X.description: Asset. Attack Effect. Visibility OR is X MU to this Light Source, and for any character in base-contact with it. A model in base-contact with or equipped with a Light Source may never be Hidden unless out of LOS.

Light X (Cone).description: See Light X. Creates a 45-degree Point-light source front-arc outwards to the target and illuminates any other models within X MU of it. This only benefits any character behind the LOF from the Light source to a target, and any Attentive character.

Light X (Directional).description: See Light X. Increase Light X by +2 but only for the character equipped with this item, and any Attentive Friendly character in base-contact if this character is also Attentive.

Light X (Flicker).description: See Light X. Whenever using this as the Active character, increase Light X by +2 but only for the character equipped with this item is Attentive.

Line X > List.description: Attack Effect. Energy. All models along LOS and along the LOF to the first target are also targets if they are within 1 MU of LOF. Apply effects of traits in list List for all targets once the Range Combat Hit is passed. Reduce X by every X ORM to a target.

Lucky X.description: Genetic. Magic. Skill. Begins the game with X Luck Points which it may spend at any time. Each spent provides +1 Base die any Test, to itself or to any target within Luck OR. Luck OR is X × 8 MU; and each ORM reduces X by 1 effectively for other targets. Regain a Luck Point for each Fear or Delay token placed upon itself or a Friendly model within Luck OR, or upon two Friendly models within double Luck OR. Disallow placing those tokens or spending Luck Points upon a target with an equal or higher Lucky X.

Machine.description: Unnatural. See Resist 4 > { Bio-agent, Bio-hazard, Bio-neural, Thermal }. Never performs Morale Tests. Modifies the Suppression Test to use either FOR or REF. Any misses are assigned as Wound damage instead. Doesn’t benefit from the Revive action unless that has the MEMSic or Magic keywords. When it would be KO’d it is instead Impaired and remains In Play. It is penalized -1 Base die all Tests and reduces all traits it has by one level. When Eliminated, it instead becomes an Obstacle and creates Difficult Blocking terrain at its full dimensions as would any obstacle. If using the Champions Archetypes rules, this Archetype may never host a Champion Pattern embodiment. ()

Magic.description: This is a hook for many game-effects.

Magus X.description: Identify X spells assigned or picked as Mastered; each of those receive +X INT when Attacker. All Spells otherwise presume +X levels.

Manapool X.description: Magic. Skill. Begins each Mission with X Base dice as  MUMana dice MU to spend on any tests involving traits with the keywords  MUEtheric MU,  MUArcane MU, or  MUMagic MU. To regain |Mana dice|, the character must be Attentive Ordered and be assigned one or more traits with the Magic keyword. Spend 2 AP, or an Initiative Point and 1 AP to regain each  MUMana dice MU.

Manifest.description: May start the game at a later time; keep character out of play until desired. Costs 1 AP to appear but may be placed on the board no closer than 3 MU to any model.

Master of Winds X.description: Select any target model within X × 12 MU. Perform Unopposed INT test. Move the target Cascades × 1 MU in any direction. Remove existing Smoke, Gas, Fire elements from play within 6 MU of the line between this model and the target.

Materials-A X.description: Intrinsic. If there is at least 1 Armor Rating remaining after applying Concentrate and reducing for Impact, add X to the Armor Rating.

Materials-H X.description: Intrinsic. If there is at least 1 Armor Rating remaining after applying Concentrate and reducing for Impact, add X to the Armor Rating.

Medic X.description: Receive +X Base dice performing Revive on others, or +X Modifier dice performing Revive action upon self.

Medic X > List.description: see Medic X. Every 3 cascades, remove one of the status tokens in list List, e.g.; Burn, Poison, Acid, Confused. List size limited to X entries.

Megabase X.description: Intrinsic. The model shares its base with X similar models. The Archetype remains as a single model, but regard it as SIZ +X and set base-diameter to match. Receive +X Base dice for Disengage, Detect, Close Combat Tests, and Range Combat Hit Tests, and +X Impact. Regard the base as having +X Physicality, and +X Hands unless it has any of the [Beast] traits.

Megabase X+1.description: Intrinsic. The model shares its base with X similar models. The Archetype remains as a single model, but regard it as SIZ +X and set base-diameter to match. Receive +X Base dice for Disengage, Detect, Close Combat Tests, and Range Combat Hit Tests, and +X Impact. Regard the base as having +X Physicality, and +X Hands unless it has any of the [Beast] traits.

Melee.description: Asset. This weapon may be used normally while Engaged but must resolve the Hit Tests as by using Opposed CCA. The target must one which has this Engaged. When using this weapon for Defender Close Combat, it becomes an Improvised Melee Weapon.

Mob.description: Psychology. See Expendable. See Fodder.
